shunt_resistance.docs:
**ohms**: The value of the High Side Shunt Resistor.

*See also: [MAX9611/9612 High Side Current+Voltage+Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max9611.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage.docs:
The information for the voltage sensor
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the voltage sensor.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MAX9611/9612 High Side Current+Voltage+Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max9611.html#configuration-variables)*

current.docs:
The information for the current sensor, scaled by the gain factor and multiplied by voltage
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the current sensor.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MAX9611/9612 High Side Current+Voltage+Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max9611.html#configuration-variables)*

power.docs:
The information for the power sensor
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the power sensor.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MAX9611/9612 High Side Current+Voltage+Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max9611.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
The information for the temperature sensor
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the temperature sensor.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MAX9611/9612 High Side Current+Voltage+Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max9611.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [MAX9611/9612 High Side Current+Voltage+Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max9611.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x70`.

*See also: [MAX9611/9612 High Side Current+Voltage+Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max9611.html#configuration-variables)*
